attributes.action:
STOP ALL WORK ON HS2 NOW ! 
CANCEL THE WHOLE PROJECT, DOWN TOOLS AND WALK AWAY.
attributes.additional_details:
Infrastructure projects of this magnitude must be viewed not only the cost & theorised benefit in the future but more about what is needed in the immediate, short, medium and long term interests and needs of the country.
There are immediate needs to improve public transport in large parts of the country. There is a shorter term need to improve infrastructures that already exist, East Coast main line for example.
There is a need in this digital age to improve and ensure a robust and reliable internet connection covering the nation, no more 'Black Spots'.
Focus the efforts of Tax Payers money into projects that we can see a benefit from, not an over inflated, expensive to operate and expensive to use White Elephant as HS2
attributes.background:
The spiralling costs of this out dated and ill thought out project will be in addition to the burden of the effects being felt, and will be felt by generations to come, through the Covid-19 pandemic.

Minimal benefit to 95% of the population, stop wasting Tax Payers money

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one or more of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Cancel HS2 and use the money for the NHS and local economies, post Covid-19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311642

Commit to a public review of HS2 project and suspend all on-going work now:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314520

Hold a public vote on HS2 project as it is being paid for by the public:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326850

Cancel HS2 and use the £100bn to provide superfast fibre broadband to EVERY home:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327525
